tooltip.inscribedbyancients.archeologist: A Journal that keeps tracks of all that you've learned about an Ancient Civilization.
Right-click on an Inscribed Block to write down its phrase, Right-click while holding an Artifact with this book in your Off-Hand to write down its phrase.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.nether_anthr: An otherworldly coal that is warm to the touch.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.artifact.shi: Right-click with a Book & Quill in the Off-hand.
advancements.inscribedbyancients.root.de: This land is old, explore in the right places and you might unearth something groundbreaking!
advancement.inscribedbyancients.write_th: Write that down, WRITE THAT DOWN!
Use a Book & Quill to write down 5 ancient inscriptions to obtain the Archeologists' Journal
